pr_title: Add gateway version cmd in Java client

timeline.message: feat(clients/java): add gateway version to Java client
feat(clients/java): add gateway version to Java client

timeline.bodyText:
Let's keep the error message more similar to our normal messages, e.g.

Expected to gateway version to be defined, but nothing found

Or

Failed to read gateway version, none was defined
